Event.Message: Hypervisor successfully started.
Hypervisor scheduler type is %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SchedulerType" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor Eventlog for global system events could not be created!
Hypervisor launch has been disabled through the hypervisorlaunchtype bcdedit setting.
Hypervisor Eventlog creation failed!
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor Eventlog deletion failed!
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Host processor features mask: %1
Host xsave features mask: %2
Host cache line flush size: %3 bytes
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessorFeatures" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="XsaveFeatures" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="CLFlushSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Host processor features mask: %2
Host xsave features mask: %3
Host cache line flush size: %4 bytes
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BankCount" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="ProcessorFeatures" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64" count="BankCount"/> <data name="XsaveFeatures" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="CLFlushSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor fails to start ETW tracing session.
Hypervisor Eventlog flush failed!
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; sleep and hibernate could not be disabled (status %1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; the hypervisor boot loader's internal logic failed (BalStatus %1, sub-status %2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BalStatus" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; the hypervisor boot loader was unable to allocate sufficient resources to perform the launch.
Hypervisor launch failed; the hypervisor boot loader does not support the vendor of at least one of the processors in the system.
Hyper-V launch failed; the system does not appear to have a sufficient level of ACPI support to launch the hypervisor.
Hypervisor launch failed; at least one of the processors in the system does not appear to provide a virtualization platform supported by the hypervisor.
Hyper-V launch failed; the image %1 could not be loaded (status %2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; the image %1 failed code integrity checks, and cannot be used.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; the image %1 does not contain the image description datastructures, and cannot be used.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hyper-V launch failed; at least one of the processors in the system was unable to launch the hypervisor (status %1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BalStatus" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor Load Options - %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LoadOptions" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; the hypervisor image is revision %1, but the currently installed virtualization software only supports launching revision %2 hypervisor images.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HypervisorVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VersionSupported" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; Either VMX not present or not enabled in BIOS.
Hypervisor launch failed; Either SVM not present or not enabled in BIOS.
Hypervisor launch failed; EL2 not present.
Hypervisor launch failed; Either No Execute feature (NX) not present or not enabled in BIOS.
Hypervisor launch failed; Processor does not support the minimum features required to run the hypervisor (MSR index %1, allowed bits %2, required bits %3).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MSRIndex" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="AllowedZeroes" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="AllowedOnes" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; Processor does not provide the features necessary to run the hypervisor (leaf %1, register %2: features needed %3, features supported %4).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Leaf" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Register" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="FeaturesNeeded" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="FeaturesSupported" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; Hypervisor image does not match the platform being run on.
Hypervisor launch failed; Required firmware table not found.
Hypervisor launch failed; Encountered invalid firmware information.
Hypervisor launch failed; Second Level Address Translation is required to launch the hypervisor.
Hypervisor launch failed; Secure Mode Extensions have been enabled by the BIOS. Please disable Secure Mode Extensions in the BIOS to launch Hyper-V.
Hypervisor launch failed; Minimum CPUID leaves required by the hypervisor are not supported on the system.
Hypervisor launch failed; The physical address limit supported has been exceeded.

Hypervisor launch failed; The hypervisor was unable to initialize successfully (phase %1), and was not started. This initialization failure may be the result of a platform configuration or firmware issue. Contact your system vendor for more information or updated firmware.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Phase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; Too many runtime services memory ranges described by firmware.
Hypervisor launch failed; The operating systems boot loader failed with error %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NtStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor launch failed; The operating system boot loader was unable to locate a required resource.
Hypervisor launch failed; The operating system boot loader detected a persistent memory failure.
Hypervisor launch failed; The operating system boot loader was unable to allocate sufficient memory to complete the operation.
Hypervisor launch failed; The operating system boot loader was unable to allocate sufficient resources to complete the operation.
Hypervisor launch failed; The operating system boot loader detected a memory map conflict.
Hypervisor launch failed; the version of the microcode update dll does not match the current operating system.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExpectedVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ActualVersion" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ExpectedFunctionTableSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ActualFunctionTableSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UpdateDllName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor processor startup failed (APIC ID %1, status %2). Further processors in the system were not started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CPU" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor processor startup failed (APIC ID %1) due to CPUID feature validation error. Further processors in the system were not started. Leaf %2, register %3 feature mismatch: BSP has features %5; AP has features %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CPU" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="LeafNumber" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Register" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="BSPCpuidData" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="APCpuidData" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Hypervisor initialized I/O remapping.
Hardware present: %1 Hardware enabled: %2 Policy: %3 Enabled features: %4 Internal information: %5 Problems: %6 Additional information: %7
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HardwarePresent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="HardwareEnabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="Policy" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="EnabledFeatures" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="InternalInfo" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Problems" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="AdditionalInfo" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor I/O remapping is forcibly enabled by policy (the hypervisoriommupolicy BCD option is set to enable). If the system exhibits instability or reduced performance, consider restoring the default policy.

There is an I/O remapping problem with the sytem BIOS.
Problems: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Problems" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A device is operating with reduced performance because of a problem with the system BIOS.
The device is not reported under the scope of a unique I/O remapping unit.
Device ID: %1 Partition ID: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceId" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PartitionId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A device will not work correctly because of a problem with the system BIOS.
The Requester IDs reported for the device overlap with those reported for another device.
Device ID: %1 Partition ID: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceId" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PartitionId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A device will not work correctly because the hypervisor does not have enough resources.
Device ID: %1 Partition ID: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceId" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PartitionId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A device will not work correctly because of a problem with the system BIOS.
An IOAPIC is not correctly reported.
IOAPIC ID: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="IoApicId" inType="win:UInt8" outType="win:HexInt8"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A device could not be used by a child partition because of a limitation of the system hardware and BIOS.
The I/O remapping unit that controls the device does not have sufficient capabilities.
Device ID: %1 I/O remapping unit base address: %2 Partition ID: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceId" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="UnitBaseAddress" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PartitionId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message:
A device could not be used by a child partition because of a limitation of the system hardware and BIOS.
The device cannot be securely used by a child partition.
Device ID: %1 Partition ID: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceId" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PartitionId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: The image %1 could not be read (status %2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The image %1 failed code integrity checks, and cannot be used.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor failed to properly synchronize TSC across logical processors (Max delta: %1, Min delta: %2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MaxDelta" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="MinDelta" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Host processor features mask: %1
Host xsave features mask: %2
Host cache line flush size: %3 bytes
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessorFeatures" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="XsaveFeatures" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="CLFlushSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Host processor features mask: %2
Host xsave features mask: %3
Host cache line flush size: %4 bytes
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BankCount" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="ProcessorFeatures" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64" count="BankCount"/> <data name="XsaveFeatures" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="CLFlushSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Hypervisor configured mitigations for CVE-2018-3646 for virtual machines.
Processor not affected: %1 Processor family not affected: %2 Processor supports cache flush: %3 HyperThreading enabled: %4 Parent hypervisor applies mitigations: %5 Mitigations disabled by bcdedit: %6 Mitigations enabled: %7 Cache flush needed: %8
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotAffectedRdclNo" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="NotAffectedAtom" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="CacheFlushSupported" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="SmtEnabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ParentHypervisorFlushes" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="DisabledLoadOption" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="Enabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="CacheFlushNeeded" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor initial page allocation NUMA policy: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InitialAllocationNumaPolicy" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The hypervisor did not enable mitigations for CVE-2018-3646, CVE-2019-11091, CVE-2018-12126, CVE-2018-12127, and CVE-2018-12130 for virtual machines because HyperThreading is enabled and the hypervisor core scheduler is not enabled. To enable mitigations for virtual machines, enable the core scheduler by running "bcdedit /set hypervisorschedulertype core" from an elevated command prompt and reboot.
The queried interface version %1 is not supported (Min : %2, Max : %3).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CurrentVersion" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="MinVersion" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="MaxVersion" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Message: The queried interface is incomplete.
Partition persistence services will be unavailable.
The configured Minroot settings are not compatible with the hypervisor core scheduler and have been overriden. This may expose a different number of logical processors to the root partition.
Failed to unregister the remote hypercall interface (status %1).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NtStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Hypervisor configured mitigations for CVE-2019-11091, CVE-2018-12126, CVE-2018-12127, CVE-2018-12130 for virtual machines.
Processor not affected: %1 Processor family not affected: %2 Processor supports microarchitectural buffer flush: %3 Buffer flush needed: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NotAffectedMdsNo" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="NotAffectedAtom" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="MdClearSupported" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="BufferFlushNeeded" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hypervisor Load Options are conflicting - %1, %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="LoadOptions" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LoadFlags" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: The hypervisor did not enable mitigations for CVE-2018-3646, CVE-2019-11091, CVE-2018-12126, CVE-2018-12127, and CVE-2018-12130 for virtual machines because HyperThreading is enabled. To enable mitigations for virtual machines, disable HyperThreading.
AMD PSP PCI device discovered. Segment: %1, bus: %2, device: %3, function: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Segment" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Bus" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Device" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Function" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Message: Secure firmware update status: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Secure firmware image invalid.
Secure firmware version: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Version" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Hyper-V failed creating a new partition (status %1)!

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PartitionId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NtStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="AuxiliaryData" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hyper-V detected access to a restricted MSR (Msr: %1, IsWrite: %2, MsrValue: %3, AccessStatus: %4, Pc: %5, ImageBase: %6, ImageChecksum: %7, ImageTimestamp: %8, ImageName: %9).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Msr" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="IsWrite" inType="win:UInt8" outType="win:HexInt8"/> <data name="MsrValue" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="AccessStatus" inType="win:UInt16" outType="win:HexInt16"/> <data name="Pc" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ImageBase" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ImageChecksum" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ImageTimestamp" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ImageName" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Hyper-V successfully created a new partition (partition %1).
